title.en: Kachou no Dokusenyoku ga Tsuyosugi Desu!

description.en:
Their height difference is 40 centimeters! Konatsu's boss is so handsome like a model?! Konatsu, a petite woman working in a publishing company, was transferred to the Shoujo Manga Division, which is a dream come true for her. While going to work, she bumped into a tall, handsome man. And he is the section chief! He's strict with work and looks scary, but he always helps Konatsu when she's having a hard time. This kindness... is due to him being her superior, right? Or perhaps...?

Hearts will flutter! And their desire to monopolize each other can't be contained! It's a love story set in the office, with love amateurs experiencing love for the first time!
